__e: So, it is about rebelling against your parents.
But gentlemen, this call to arms, to rebellion against the king's grace is something which are my conscience I cannot agree to.
I don't know how they did it, but they've started a rebellion against the Overlords.
I thought we came here to prevent a rebellion.
Your father had to go to war to end his rebellion.
If the king got what he wanted all the time, he'd still be fighting a damned rebellion.
Rebellion in a young man your age is a necessary fact of life.
Well, I don't want him thinking it's some kind of big rebellion.
This act of rebellion is a problem between you and the king.
Miss Mu, I know you're not willing to rebel, and I don't want to bring down the mountain village.
He said they'd been working around the clock because of the rebellion and it's a relief to know that your illness is merely a natural consequence of your condition.
You must tell me of the rebellion. How you fought the king himself.
